summary: An ordinance to the condemnation proceedings to acquire land and other property in Blocks 6 & 7, Terry's 5th Addition, Blocks 4 & 9, Plummer's Addition, and Block 213, Seattle Tidelands for the expansion of existing city shop and storage facilities under Ordinance 91851, accepting certain jury awards and making a reimbursable appropriation from the City Street Fund for the payment of awards.
